Title: Shortest Subsequence
Description:
You are given a DNA sequence consisting of characters A, C, G, and T. 
 Your task is to find the shortest DNA sequence that is not a subsequence of the original sequence.
Input Specification: The only input line contains a DNA sequence with n characters.
Output Specification: Print the shortest DNA sequence that is not a subsequence of the original sequence. If there are several solutions, you may print any of them.
